channel.title: [pi] repp ++ for who can help me!
channel.description: I coded world switch button that works fine. Im hosting the same sources but on different ports 1 pvp world 1 normal . But when i login from world 1 to world 2 the charachter loads from the different sources. Now what i'm asking is how can i make it so it wil load 2 sources on 1 database?
